Definition at line 37 of file occupancy_query_server.cpp.

bool OccupancyQueryServerNode::convertToCell ( const double  m_x,
const double  m_y,
int &  c_x,
int &  c_y 
) const
inlineprivate

Determine the grid cell that contains the point given by a map coordinate.

Returns
flag if the coordinate (m_x, m_y) is in the map. If the coordinate is outside the map, then c_x and c_y are not valid cell coordinates for this map.

Definition at line 249 of file occupancy_query_server.cpp.

bool OccupancyQueryServerNode::convertToCell ( const double  m_x,
const double  m_y,
double &  c_x,
double &  c_y 
) const
inlineprivate

Determine the grid cell that contains the point given by a map coordinate.

This version does not round the grid cell coordinates.

Returns
flag if the coordinate (m_x, m_y) is in the map. If the coordinate is outside the map, then c_x and c_y are not valid cell coordinates for this map.

Definition at line 265 of file occupancy_query_server.cpp.

bool OccupancyQueryServerNode::convertToMap ( const int  c_x,
const int  c_y,
double &  m_x,
double &  m_y 
) const
inlineprivate

Determine the map coordinates given map cell.

The computed map coordinates correspond to the center of the cell.

Returns
flag if the cell with index (c_x, c_y) is in the map. If the cell is outside the map, then m_x and m_y are not valid map coordinates for this map.

Definition at line 281 of file occupancy_query_server.cpp.

const double  c_y,
double &  m_x,
double &  m_y 
) const
inlineprivate

Determine the map coordinates given map cell.

Returns
flag if the cell with index (c_x, c_y) is in the map. If the cell is outside the map, then m_x and m_y are not valid map coordinates for this map.
